conditionMatchedLog.filter: resource.type = "servicehealth.googleapis.com/Event" AND labels."servicehealth.googleapis.com/new_event" = true AND jsonPayload.state = "ACTIVE" AND jsonPayload.@type = "type.googleapis.com/google.cloud.servicehealth.logging.v1.EventLog" AND jsonPayload.category = "INCIDENT" AND jsonPayload.impactedLocations =~ "asia-southeast2"
